### Backend (Runpod)

orchestrator/        # FastAPI job router
services/
â”œâ”€â”€ runner-gpu/      # SDXL-Turbo generation
â”œâ”€â”€ validator-lite/  # Quick validation
â””â”€â”€ validator-full/  # Full BrandScore

### Infrastructure
- **Primary GPU**: Runpod RTX 4000 Ada fleet
- **Networking**: Tailscale mesh (MagicDNS + ACLs)
- **Secrets**: Vault for dynamic tokens
- **Monitoring**: Grafana + Prometheus

## ðŸ“ Recent Decisions

### ADR-001: Docker Deployment Strategy
- Run Expo dev locally on Mac mini
- Deploy backend services to Runpod via Docker
- Use multi-stage builds for optimization

### ADR-002: Memory Synchronization System
- Auto-save Claude sessions every 10 minutes
- Bidirectional sync with Cursor via GitHub
- Cross-tool context sharing

## ðŸ”‘ Key Patterns

### SwipeDeck Implementation
```typescript
// Use Reanimated for smooth native-thread animations
const translateX = useSharedValue(0);
const gesture = Gesture.Pan()
  .onChange((event) => {
    translateX.value = event.translationX;
  })
  .onEnd((event) => {
    if (Math.abs(event.translationX) > SWIPE_THRESHOLD) {
      // Submit rating
    }
  });
```

### Rating Loop
```
User swipes â†’ Batch locally â†’ POST /ratings every 10-15 swipes
â†’ Backend updates embeddings â†’ Generates new batch
â†’ Fresh images stream back â†’ Improvement visible by swipe ~25
```

### GPU Job Flow
```
POST /jobs â†’ Redis Stream â†’ Runpod worker picks up
â†’ SDXL-Turbo generates â†’ BrandScore validates
â†’ Store in S3 â†’ Return URLs â†’ Mobile prefetches
```
